errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
errors.network: Cannot connect to the server. Please try again later.
errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.internalError: The system encountered an unexpected issue. Please try again later.
errors.notFound: The requested resource could not be found.
errors.badRequest: The request is invalid. Please review the data and try again.
errors.validationError: Some fields failed validation. Please double-check and resubmit.
errors.itemNotFound: The item you are looking for does not exist.
errors.itemExists: This item already exists. Try a different value.
errors.mfaBroken: MFA configuration is corrupted. Restart the setup flow.
errors.invalidOtp: The verification code is incorrect. Please try again.
errors.passwordNotMatch: Password does not match our records.
errors.passwordExpired: Your password has expired. Please reset it.
errors.passwordMaxAttempt: Password attempt limit reached. Please wait before retrying.
errors.userExisted: User already exists. Try signing in instead.
errors.userNotActive: This account is inactive. Contact an administrator.
errors.invalidToken: The token is invalid. Please request a new one.
errors.expiredToken: The token has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.permissionDenied: You do not have permission to perform this action.
errors.sessionExpired: Your session expired. Please sign in again.
errors.invalidFile: The uploaded file format is not supported.
errors.importDataInvalid: Import data is invalid. Fix the file and retry.
errors.oauthProviderNotFound: The OAuth provider is not recognized.
errors.invalidGoogleAccount: Google account is invalid for this action.
errors.invalidTelegramAccount: Telegram account is invalid for this action.
errors.telegramAccountWasLinked: Telegram account has already been linked.
errors.mfaHasBeenSetup: MFA is already configured for this account.
errors.mfaNotEnabled: MFA is not enabled yet. Please set it up first.
errors.invalidBackupCode: Backup code is incorrect or already used.
errors.backupCodeAlreadyUsed: This backup code was already used.
errors.suspiciousLoginBlocked: Suspicious login attempt was blocked for safety.
errors.tooManyAttempts: Too many attempts. Please slow down and try again later.

hero.title: Admin Portal
hero.subtitle: Multi-layer security for your operations team.

items.audit: Live auditing for every privileged session
items.mfa: MFA and backup codes ready out of the box

login.title: Secure sign in
login.subtitle: Use your workplace credentials to access the admin console.
login.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters

register.title: Create your workspace account
register.subtitle: Use your work email and a strong password to get started.
register.rateLimited: Too many attempts. Please retry in {{seconds}}s.
register.otpSubtitle: Enter the 6-digit code we sent to {{email}}.
register.otpLimitReached: You have reached the resend limit. Please try again later.

mfa.title: Two-factor verification
mfa.subtitle: Enter the OTP from your authenticator app.
mfa.locked: Too many attempts. Please wait or restart the login flow.

backup.title: Use a backup code
backup.subtitle: Enter one of your backup codes to continue.
backup.locked: Too many attempts. Switch back to OTP or restart login.

setup.title: Multi-factor protection required
setup.subtitle: We need to set up an authenticator app before granting access.
setup.requestHint: If you reloaded the page, request a new secret to continue.
setup.scanSubtitle: Add it to Google Authenticator, 1Password, Authy, or any TOTP app.
setup.copyHint: Can't scan the code? Copy the secret above and paste it into your app.
setup.backupHint: After confirming, you'll verify one more OTP (or a backup code) to finish login.

health.overviewDescription: Live status for core infrastructure so you can react quickly when something degrades.
health.error: Unable to load health status. Please try again.

componentDescriptions.memory: Usage and free capacity from application hosts.
componentDescriptions.disk: Disk usage across the main volume.

mySessionsPage.title: My sessions
mySessionsPage.subtitle: Review and manage recent sign-in sessions for your account.
mySessionsPage.notice: If you notice unfamiliar activity, revoke the suspicious session or sign out from all devices.

actions.revokeCurrentConfirm: This will revoke the current session and sign you out from the system.
actions.revokeOtherConfirm: This session will be revoked. Continue?
actions.logoutAllConfirmTitle: Confirm sign out from all devices
actions.logoutAllConfirm: You will be signed out from all devices, including this one.

accessDeniedPage.title: You are not allowed to access this page
accessDeniedPage.subtitle: Contact your administrator to request the required permissions.

form.name: Display name
form.rolesRequired: Please select at least one role
form.mfaReasonPlaceholder: Provide a reason for the audit log

delete.title: Confirm delete role
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this role? The role cannot be deleted if there are still users using it.

form.title: Role name
form.titleMin: Role name must be at least 3 characters
form.permissionsRequired: Please select at least one permission
form.permissionsMin: Must select at least one permission

info.note: Note: Permissions are automatically created from the backend when seeding the database. FE cannot create/update/delete permissions directly.

descriptions.ROLE.VIEW: View list and details of roles
descriptions.USER.VIEW: View list and details of users
descriptions.SESSION.VIEW_ALL: View all sessions in the system

form.secretWarning: Current value is hidden for security reasons. Please enter a new value if you want to change it.
form.secretPlaceholder: Enter new value (old value is hidden for security reasons)

actions.revokeConfirm: This session will be revoked. Continue?

adminSessionsPage.onlyOneSessionNotice: The system is configured to allow only one active session per user. When a user signs in from a new device, previous sessions will be automatically logged out.
